ICMR Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for Young Professional-II Posts
Harshitha / All Government Jobs / Aug 26, 2025, 10:08 IST
 Indian Council of Medical Research
 1 Jobs |  Posted On : 26-Aug-2025 |  Delhi |  Salary : 42,000 to 42,000




FOLLOW

The Indian Council of Medical Research (ICMR) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 01 Young Professional-II Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their post-graduation can apply for the ICMR Recruitment 2025. The interested applicants can apply in offline mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, application fee, salary, and how to apply for these posts before the deadline. The application dates have already begun.




If you are more interested in Government Jobs, candidates can also apply for jobs in Delhi.

ICMR Recruitment 2025 Eligibility Criteria:
Name of the Posts	Vacancies	Education
Young Professional -II	01	Post-graduation

ICMR Recruitment 2025 Age Limit:

The minimum salary: 21 Years.
The maximum salary: 40 Years.
Age relaxation is based on the Organisation's norms.

ICMR Recruitment 2025 Selection Process:

The selection process is based on the interview.

ICMR Recruitment 2025 Application Fee:

There is no application fee.

ICMR Recruitment 2025 Pay Scale:

The basic pay: Rs. 42,000/- per month.
How to Apply for the ICMR Recruitment 2025:
Go to the official website.
Visit the ICMR Recruitment 2025 notification.
Read the instructions carefully and check the eligiblity criteria.
If you are eligible.
Gather all the required documents.
Submit the documents to the mentioned e-mail address.

E-mail Address:

secretariat.ncahticmr@gmail.com.

Important Dates:

Starting date	20-08-2025
Closing date	10-09-2025

 

Official Notification	Click Here
Join Whatsapp Group	Join Now
Join on Telegram	Join Now
